title: "Just CC her"
body:
Too bad her r%%%%%ed AOE effects everyone. Devote your entire kit to shutting down 1 champ while their team is facerolling on yours.

Even if you blow your CC on her she can still just Zimmerman's. 

She's not hard to play, it's hard to truly shit her down, and she has zero counterplay.

If she gets a single kill (which isn't hard to do, don't let the sheep tell you otherwise) she can immediately faceroll through an entire 1v5.
